user.title: Connection Type
user.description: Select how you want to connect to your UniFi Controller.

data_description.connection_type:
Local: Connect directly to your UniFi device on your network.
Remote: Connect via UniFi Cloud using your cloud API key.

local.title: Local Connection
local.description: Connect directly to your UniFi device on your local network.

data_description.host: The URL of your UniFi device (e.g., https://192.168.1.1)
data_description.api_key: API key from your UniFi Controller (Settings → Control Plane → API Keys)
data_description.verify_ssl: Disable for self-signed certificates (common for local devices)

remote.title: Remote Connection (UniFi Cloud)
remote.description: Connect to your UniFi device via the UniFi Cloud.

data_description.console_id: Your UniFi Console ID from unifi.ui.com
data_description.api_key: Cloud API key from your UniFi account

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate
reauth_confirm.description: The UniFi Insights integration needs to re-authenticate your account.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure
reconfigure.description: Update the UniFi Insights integration configuration.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to UniFi controller. Please check the host address and network connectivity.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please verify your credentials.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for details.

abort.account_mismatch: The API key provided does not match the original account. Please use the same API key or remove and re-add the integration.

init.title: UniFi Insights Options
init.description: Configure additional options for the UniFi Insights integration.

data_description.track_wifi_clients: Create device tracker entities for connected WiFi clients. This may create many entities.
data_description.track_wired_clients: Create device tracker entities for connected wired (LAN) clients. This may create many entities.

refresh_data.name: Refresh Data
refresh_data.description: Force an immediate refresh of UniFi Insights data.

site_id.name: Site ID
site_id.description: Optional site ID to refresh. If not specified, refreshes all sites.

site_id.name: Site ID
site_id.description: The site ID where the device is located.

device_id.name: Device ID
device_id.description: The ID of the device to restart.

cannot_connect.message: Unable to connect to UniFi controller at {host}. Please check the host address and network connectivity.

invalid_auth.message: Invalid API key. Please verify your credentials and try again.

timeout.message: Connection to UniFi controller timed out. The device may be unreachable or overloaded.

device_not_found.message: Device {device_id} was not found in site {site_id}.

no_coordinator.message: No UniFi Insights coordinator found. Please ensure the integration is properly configured.

no_protect_coordinator.message: No UniFi Protect coordinator found. Please ensure UniFi Protect is available.
